segments.text: Hello . I'd like to change my reservation for March 19 . My name is Mary Chang .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , yes , Miss Chang . What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'd like to change the date to March 20 , and make that for two singles , not one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well . That can be arranged .
segments.speaker: S2
